channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 5 Top Bargain Stocks Ready for a Bull Run
Analysis-Soaring electric truck sales deal new blow to diesel use in China
'Not A Parody': White House Mercilessly Mocked Over Super-Weird New Trump Image
Farm Share to distribute produce, canned goods in Tallahassee area
Son of ‘El Chapo’ expected to plead guilty in drug trafficking case
item.description: A son of drug lord Joaquin “El Chapo” Guzman is expected to plead guilty in a U.S. drug trafficking case

item.title: Costa Rican lawmaker says U.S. revoked her visa over alleged ties to Communist Party
item.description: The vice president of Costa Rica’s Congress says the U.S. embassy revoked her visa over alleged ties to the Chinese Communist Party

item.title: Wildfires force evacuations at Grand Canyon's North Rim and Colorado national park
item.description: Visitors and staff at two national parks in the U.S. West have been evacuted because of wildfires

item.title: Federal officials say Georgia Republican was running a $140 million Ponzi scheme
item.description: Federal officials are accusing Georgia Republican Brant Frost IV of running a Ponzi scheme that defrauded 300 investors of $140 million

item.title: North Carolina's first standalone children's hospital set to bring 8,000 jobs to a Raleigh suburb
item.description: North Carolina's first standalone children’s hospital will be built in a bedroom community of Raleigh

item.title: Israel says Iran could reach enriched uranium at a nuclear site hit by US
